MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting LL55 Postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting a large number of customers in a wide spread area. We had no advance warning of the power cut and only became aware of it at 3.32AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.58AM on 18th February 2021.
